testcase.name: testCheckInWithInvalidBooking
testcase.system-out:
=== 测试无效预订入住 === 1. 测试不存在的预订ID: 17:31:25.675 [main] INFO com.hotel.util.ConnectionPool - Database connection pool initialized successfully 17:31:26.160 [main] INFO com.alibaba.druid.pool.DruidDataSource - {dataSource-1} inited 17:31:26.171 [main] DEBUG com.hotel.util.ConnectionPool - Database connection obtained - 结果: false (应该为false)
2. 查找已入住的预订: 17:31:26.183 [main] DEBUG com.hotel.util.ConnectionPool - Database connection obtained - 找到已入住预订: #2 17:31:26.191 [main] DEBUG com.hotel.util.ConnectionPool - Database connection obtained - 正确抛出异常: 预订状态不允许入住或入住日期未到

testcase.name: testCheckInFunctionality
testcase.system-out:
=== 测试入住功能 === 1. 查找已确认的预订: 17:31:26.193 [main] DEBUG com.hotel.util.ConnectionPool - Database connection obtained - 预订#20 状态:CHECKED_OUT 客户ID:6 房间ID:1 - 预订#19 状态:CHECKED_OUT 客户ID:11 房间ID:18 - 预订#16 状态:CHECKED_OUT 客户ID:5 房间ID:4 - 预订#15 状态:CHECKED_OUT 客户ID:5 房间ID:17 - 预订#14 状态:CHECKED_OUT 客户ID:5 房间ID:13 - 预订#12 状态:CHECKED_OUT 客户ID:5 房间ID:14 - 预订#8 状态:CHECKED_OUT 客户ID:1 房间ID:9 - 预订#7 状态:CHECKED_OUT 客户ID:5 房间ID:4 - 预订#6 状态:CHECKED_OUT 客户ID:5 房间ID:7 - 预订#1 状态:CHECKED_OUT 客户ID:1 房间ID:2 - 预订#2 状态:CHECKED_IN 客户ID:2 房间ID:12 - 预订#4 状态:CONFIRMED 客户ID:4 房间ID:16 ✅ 找到测试预订: #4
2. 检查预订是否可以入住: - 预订#4 可以入住: true
3. 执行入住操作: 17:31:26.199 [main] DEBUG com.hotel.util.ConnectionPool - Database connection obtained 17:31:26.201 [main] DEBUG com.hotel.util.ConnectionPool - Database connection obtained 17:31:26.216 [main] INFO com.hotel.dao.impl.BookingDAOImpl - Booking updated successfully with ID: 4 17:31:26.217 [main] DEBUG com.hotel.util.ConnectionPool - Database connection obtained 17:31:26.220 [main] DEBUG com.hotel.util.ConnectionPool - Database connection obtained 17:31:26.223 [main] INFO com.hotel.dao.impl.RoomDAOImpl - Room updated successfully with ID: 16 - 入住操作结果: 成功
4. 验证预订状态更新: 17:31:26.225 [main] DEBUG com.hotel.util.ConnectionPool - Database connection obtained - 更新后状态: CHECKED_IN ✅ 入住功能测试成功！预订状态已更新为已入住
